forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Thunder is possible early. High near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder is possible early. High 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 47F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 9C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. High 49F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 5C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 41F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 10C. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 50F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 11C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 43F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 14C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 57F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High 63F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 59F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
